title: And the Truth Will Set You Free
description: 2014 release from singer/guitarist Dave Kilminster. This incredible project sees Dave reunited with drummer Pete Riley and bassist Phil Williams who toured with Dave as part of the Keith Emerson Band, and also recorded with Dave on his first solo rock album SCARLET - THE DIRECTOR'S CUT. For the last eight years Dave was the featured lead guitarist with Roger Waters, joining Roger on his last two record breaking world tours.
